Mahanama  De Silva  with Upali Jayamanne for the Petitioner
Harindra Rajapakse for the 1st and 3rd  Respondents
Ranjan  Mendis with B.S.  Peterson and  Ashoka  Kandambi for the 4th and  5th  Respondents

column2: The  Petitioner  was  at  all  times  material  to  this  application  the  Chairman  of the  Dimbulagala

letter  dated  21.02.2014  (P10) 
the  Chief  Minister  of the  North  Central
for  explanations  from  the  Petitioner  on  two  specific  charges.  Thereafter  by
letter dated 26.05.2014 (P12)  the Chief  Minister appointed the 2nd  Respondent as  the inquiring
officer in terms of section  185(2) of the Pradeshiya  Sabha  Act  No.  15 of 1987 (Pradeshiya Sabha

Act) to inquire and  report on the said  charges.

column2: It appears that after inquiry the 2nd  Respondent submitted  his report  P17  to the 1st  Respondent
who  was  by  then  the  Chief  Minister.  The  1st  Respondent  thereafter  issued  a  notification  in
terms  of section  185  of the  Pradeshiya  Sabha  Act  removing  the  Petitioner  from  the  post  of

Chairman of the Dimbulagala  Pradeshiya Sabha  (P16).
